name: Slightly Magic: 8bit Legacy Edition
summary:
The popular 1990's arcade adventure Slightly Magic has been remastered and restored by the original author/programmer Colin Jones. 
 
Combine objects with spells to activate, turn into a bird, a fish or even invisible! Complete with director's commentary, a newly-remastered soundtrack by legendary games musician Allister Brimble, enjoy this slice of gaming history!
